ComicInfo.Title: Catlick Creek; The Eyelid Burial; Adventures in Science; Fire with Fire; Ed and the Beanstalk; Adventures in Science; Joke Time [Knock Knock]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 10:42:57. [CVDB237823] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:20:28. [Issue ID 174879]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Catlick Creek: Catlick Creek floods even after a "helpful" citizen suggests draining his septic tank into it.
The Eyelid Burial: Surreal tale of Alex Tate and his double.
Adventures in Science: A professor and his assistants study the masturbation techniques of giant squids.
Fire with Fire: A boy unleashes his piranha dogs.
Ed and the Beanstalk: Satire of Jack and the Beanstalk [English fairy tale].
Adventures in Science: Scientists find the face of Jesus on masking tape.
Joke Time [Knock Knock]: A knock-knock joke.
